Text: this appears to be legit, and formatted perfectly for my ereader, unlike the other two packages I found!

The hornet's nest book is a bit rooted, every 3 pages or so, part of the text repeats itself, due to a bad convert from the original file to epub, eg: 

"Security Police could no longer be a club of former officers, where everyone knew everyone else, of former officers, where everyone knew everyone else, and where the commonest qualification for a new recruit"

Thanks for this, 3rd book is funky but not unreadable. Seeding.
